attributes.action: Send those convicted of the riots to Africa to work
attributes.additional_details: Those convicted of being involved in the riots should be sent to Africa for a tour of service. There they will help the communities by building wells , homes etc. Not only will they being doing something useful, they will be keeping numbers in prisons down, learn a trade that they can put to use in future and also realise that they are not actually as hard done by in England after all. I doubt the cost of send ing them out there etc would be any different to keeping them in prison here
